message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,650,000. It's a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,400,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I think that's the highest I can go. What do you think?

Bob, I understand your position, but $1,400,000 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down a bit, but I can't go any lower than $1,550,000. This is a fair compromise, and I hope you'll consider it.
I understand your compromise, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'll offer $1,475,000. This is my final offer, and I hope you'll consider it.
